Enrich country names or codes with EU membership information

Source: R/list_eu_countries.R
enrich_eu_country_info.Rd

This helper function checks whether the provided country names or ISO2 codes belong to EU member states (based on the EU-28 list available in countrycode).

Usage

enrich_eu_country_info(country)

Arguments

country

A character vector of country names (English) or ISO2 country codes.

Value

A character vector containing the matching country names and ISO2 codes for EU-28 member states. Returns an empty vector if no match is found.

Details

The function relies on countrycode::codelist to retrieve the list of EU-28 countries. It filters out only EU-28 members (eu28 not NA) and matches against both English country names (country.name.en) and ISO2 codes (iso2c).
